com.brogrammers.agora.model

Class Answer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.brogrammers.agora.model.Answer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Answer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Answer model data class. Contains information about Answer, including upvotes, comments, body, author. All answers should be contained by one Question.
    Author:
    Group02
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
